The Spell
Welcome to \'The Spell\'. Just click the button below for start, choose features and create your unique spell!ае spellbook Xardas, 2020\nAlpha 0.3 Write to spellbook start Pick magic school holy dark fire Pick direction Single target Area On yourself Pick effect Damage Amplify Creation next ice Decrement Might Disaster You caused a Manastorm by your actions, this combination is absolutely terrible! Accident Everything was good until one bad decision. You failed, but for a second appears spell Option Effect Info
